values (#{product_no}, #{product_category}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_stock}, sysdate, #{product_brand}, #{product_skintype}, 1)
mapper.select: select product_category, product_name, product_img, product_price, product_stock, product_regDate from product_table order by product_regDate DESC

select count(*) from product_table where product_category = #{category}
